  3/** @file    vsip/opt/fft/functor.cpp
  4    @author  Jules Bergmann, Stefan Seefeld
  5    @date    2009-07-19
  6    @brief   VSIPL++ Library: FFT expression functor
  7*/
  8
  9#ifndef VSIP_OPT_FFT_FUNCTOR_HPP
 10#define VSIP_OPT_FFT_FUNCTOR_HPP
 11
 12#include <vsip/core/block_traits.hpp>
 13#include <vsip/core/parallel/support_block.hpp>
 14
 15namespace vsip_csl
 16{
 17namespace expr
 18{
 19namespace op
 20{
 21
 22template <dimension_type D, typename Backend, typename Workspace>
 23struct fft
 24{
 25  template <typename Block>
 26  class Functor
 27  {
 28  public:
 29    static dimension_type const dim = Backend::dim;
 30    typedef Backend backend_type;
 31    typedef Workspace workspace_type;
 32    typedef typename backend_type::output_value_type result_type;
 33
 34    typedef Block block_type;
 35    typedef typename block_type::map_type map_type;
 36    typedef typename impl::View_block_storage<block_type>::plain_type block_ref_type;
 37    typedef Functor<typename impl::Distributed_local_block<Block>::type> local_type;
 38
 39    template <typename View>
 40    Functor(View arg,
 41	    Domain<D> const &output_size,
 42	    backend_type &backend,
 43	    workspace_type &workspace)
 44      : arg_(arg.block()),
 45	output_size_(output_size),
 46	backend_(backend),
 47	workspace_(workspace)
 48    {}
 49
 50    Functor(block_ref_type arg,
 51	    Domain<D> const &output_size,
 52	    backend_type &backend,
 53	    workspace_type &workspace)
 54      : arg_(arg),
 55	output_size_(output_size),
 56	backend_(backend),
 57	workspace_(workspace)
 58    {}
 59
 60    Functor(Functor const &o)
 61      : arg_(o.arg_),
 62	output_size_(o.output_size_),
 63	backend_(o.backend_),
 64	workspace_(o.workspace_)
 65    {}
 66
 67    length_type size() const
 68    {
 69      return output_size_.size();
 70    }
 71
 72    length_type size(dimension_type block_dim, dimension_type d) const
 73    {
 74      assert(block_dim == D);
 75      return output_size_[d].size();
 76    }
 77
 78    local_type local() const
 79    {
 80      // The local output size is the same as the global output size
 81      // along the dimension of the FFT.  Its size along the other
 82      // dimension matches that of the input local block.
 83      length_type rows = output_size_[0].size();
 84      length_type cols = output_size_[1].size();
 85      if (Backend::axis == 0)
 86      {
 87	cols = impl::block_subblock_domain<2>(arg_)[1].size();
 88	rows = (cols == 0) ? 0 : rows;
 89      }
 90      else
 91      {
 92	rows = impl::block_subblock_domain<2>(arg_)[0].size();
 93	cols = (rows == 0) ? 0 : cols;
 94      }
 95      Domain<2> l_output_size(rows, cols);
 96
 97      return local_type(get_local_block(arg_),
 98			l_output_size,
 99			backend_,
100			workspace_);
101    }
102
103    map_type const &map() const { return arg_.map();}
104    block_type const &arg() const { return arg_;}
105    backend_type const &backend() const { return backend_;}
106    workspace_type const &workspace() const { return workspace_;}
107
108    template <typename ResBlock>
109    void apply(ResBlock &result) const
110    {
111      workspace_.by_reference_blk(&backend_, arg_, result);
112    }
113
114  private:
115    block_ref_type arg_;
116    Domain<D> output_size_;
117    backend_type &backend_;
118    workspace_type &workspace_;
119  };
120};
121
122} // namespace vsip_csl::expr::op
123} // namespace vsip_csl::expr
124} // namespace vsip_csl
125
126#endif
